text: security is our top priority and you see
that in the way we operate internally as
well as how we engage with our customers
[Music]
hi i'm alejandra artige i'm a principal
security solutions architect at amazon
web services as a security solutions
architect i support customers design and
create robust architectures to address
the risk requirements using cloud
computing it is exciting to build and
innovate with and on behalf of the
customers in southeast asia having the
opportunity to guide those customers and
provide them with security best
practices to help them address any
security and compliance requirements or
challenges is very rewarding i have
worked in multiple financial
institutions and consulting firms and
this place feels different because we
are unusually customer focused and i see
that across the organization in a
solutions architect account managers we
take the time to understand what is
important for the customer and we use
that information to decide what we built
and how we prioritize but of course we
can only support our customers if we
take the right time internally to
sharpen this role if you want to build
learn and have fun at the same time come
and join our sa team
